medical_history.chief_complaint: Left lower quadrant pain after lunch.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient describes the pain as sharp and persistent, initially associated with nausea/vomiting for 1 day. Thereafter, she has had very poor appetite but has been passing gas and having small bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, morbid obesity, history of diverticulitis managed conservatively with antibiotics, asthma triggered by allergies, bronchitis, allergic rhinitis, complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS) of right arm, obesity, excision of infected mons pubis, history of C-sections and laparoscopic cyst drainage.
